entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.6°C

Visibility: 32.2 km

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h except east 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Haro Strait. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
